EmailTemplate.subject: RESPONSE REQUIRED: Invite to {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Program_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_First_Name__c} {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Last_Name__c}, On behalf of Four Acres and your Leadership Team, I am delighted to confirm that you have been nominated by your respective management to take part in an ambitious talent acceleration program, eXcel-rator for WL3, designed for WL3 key talent demonstrating promise for growth in Unilever.
About eXcel-rator WL3:
The eXcel-rator is multi-faceted 9-month experience, including robust feedback, Individual Development Planning, self-led assignments, executive coaching, intimate dialogues with senior Unilever leaders and two residential modules to be held at Four Acres in {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Program_Location__c}. The first residential module will be on from {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Module_1_Start_Date__c} to {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Module_1_End_Date__c}.
Here’s a 3-minute video introduction to the program: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sRYem0TNjMQ
Immediate Action Required:
Please review the attached and confirm participation on the programme by filling up {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_Invitation_Link__c} on or before {!FAU_Participant__c.FAU_RSVP_Deadline__c}
What’s coming next:
You will receive a detailed participant kit outlining key program components and pre-work You will also receive an email from a YSC Associate to begin scheduling for the first phase of this program: an assessment and feedback process into your drivers, strengths, and development opportunities.
Lastly, this program experience will be facilitated by the Four Acres team– and supported by your Leadership Development team, as well as your HRBP. Your Line Manager, Leadership Development Director and your HRBPs are copied herewith.
Congratulations again on your nomination and we look forward to hearing from you.
Kind regards, {!FAU_Participant__c.OwnerFullName} {!FAU_Participant__c.OwnerTitle}
